enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: MCGFLLCLK , or IRC48M clock as selected by SOPT2.PLLFLLSEL

field.name: FTM1CH0SRC
field.description: FTM1 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH0SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 0 input capture source select

field.name: FTM2CH1SRC
field.description: FTM2 channel 1 input capture source select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Exclusive OR of FTM2_CH1, FTM2_CH0 and FTM1_CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART0_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM1 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX pin modulated by FTM2 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM0, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM1, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write 1 to assert the TRIG0 input to FTM2, software must clear this bit to allow other trigger sources to assert

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH0 pin is output of FTM0 CH0, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH1 pin is output of FTM0 CH1, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH2 pin is output of FTM0 channel 2 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH3 pin is output of FTM0 channel 3 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH4 pin is output of FTM0 channel 4 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH5 pin is output of FTM0 channel 5 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH6 pin is output of FTM0 channel 6 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: FTM0_CH7 pin is output of FTM0 channel 7 output, modulated by FTM1 CH1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Flash remains enabled during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash is disabled for the duration of Wait mode
